thread.title: Delta’s newest in-flight safety video brings the funny
thread.title_full: Delta’s newest in-flight safety video brings the funny

title: Delta’s newest in-flight safety video brings the funny
text:
Delta Air Lines Inc. On Aug. 7, Delta released a new funny in-flight safety video. Delta Air Lines Inc. (NYSE: DAL) is turning the in-flight safety video into a comedy genre all its own. In May, it released an in-flight safety video starring more than 20 Internet memes , including the cat in a shark costume riding a Roomba, Screaming goat, the “Charlie bit my finger” kid and Nyan Cat. View it here. On Friday, the Atlanta-based carrier debuted its latest video, which is sure to give you a chuckle or two. Check it out here .
